decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (13/H/2735/101 Rev A, 13/H/2735/102 Rev A, 13/H/2735/103 Rev A and Design and Access Statement. Received: 10th September 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 2015 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order) no enlargement of the premises shall be carried out.

Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the side elevation of the single storey rear projection shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 6 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side walls of the house hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800 to 1800 on Mondays to Friday and 0800 to 1300 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays.
description: Erection of a replacement two storey house
